titles.title: A resolution to commemorate the 60th Anniversary of the Trinity Test, the culmination of the Manhattan Project, and to honor the people who made it possible.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/13/2005--Introduced. Commemorates the significance of the 60th anniversary of the Trinity Test of July 16, 1945, in Alamogordo, New Mexico (the detonation of the first atomic device), as marking one of the seminal events in human history and one that epitomizes the American spirit. Recognizes the critical role of science and technology in keeping our nation free and prosperous.
